docs.lead_paragraph: It was in the dingy, sunless workroom of a "millinery institute" on Fourteenth Street that this daring man, this careless invader of woman's sacred, rights, was found. He was young and cheerful and content, yet he was making bows to trim the hat poised familiarly, not to say jocularly, on his knee.
